name: Escapism (Maethor)
description:
Escapism is a game made for the one resource game jam of 2017 in collaboration with Ford Prefect as the artist and myself as the programmer.

Survive and escape from the evil ghosts.

When you get hit by a ghost your stamina bar drops and your options become limited.

In the main menu either use W and S key to navigate and space to press button.
